Which time periods for each analysis contain less than 5 events

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(readr)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = gsub("/analysis","",getwd()))
```

## Supplementary Table 1
